resources:
6790
CSB Communication Interface App for the Blind Text Messages Reply Message Compose Message Call Contacts Select Recipient Caller Dialer Add Contact Welcome to Communication Interface App for the Blind, please press the combination of A to make call or B to send text message Welcome to SMS module, press the following combination, I to go to next message, E to go to Previous message, A to compose message, B to reply to the current selected message Welcome to Call Module, press the following combination, I to go to next contact, E to go to previous contact, button 8 to call the selected contact, A to add new contact, B to go to dialer, alt button to go back to main menu Please select your SMS recipient, press the combination of I to go to next contact and E to go back to previous contact "Welcome to add contact module, press button 32 and 4 to switch between name and number textbox, press button 8 to save and alt button to cancel and go back to Call Module Welcome to dialer, press the corresponding number combination, press button 8 to dial the entered number, press shit to backspace, alt to cancel
Welcome to Reply, Press all left keys to abort and press all right keys to send reply, SHIFT button to backspace Sms successfully sent! Sms not sent! Sms Generic Failure Sms not sent! No Service Sms not sent! Null PDU Sms could not be sent! Radio is OFF Sms Delivered Sms not Delivered
Welcome to Compose Message Please enter mobile phone number you want send message, or press ALT + SHIFT buttons to select contacts from the List You may now create your message, press all right buttons to send the composed message, press all left buttons to cancel and go back to Inbox
128 8 69 73 65 66 83 192 64 36 65 66
/* *CANCEL - 128(ALT) + C COMBINATION SEND/OK/SELECT/CALL - 128 + A COMBINATION SELECT CONTACT - S COMBINATION FOCUS CHANGER EDITTEXT - 4 + 32 SPACE - 128(ALT) + 32 BACKSPACE - 128(ALT) + 64 (SHIFT) PHONE NUMBER - 0 to 9 COMBI + 128(ALT) */
68 160 66 65 64
68
88 160
